title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 28 July 2015 - XWiki
content:
<Enygma`> has quit  
00:26 <vmassol> has quit  
01:17 <abusenius> has quit  
04:12 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
04:13 <Slashman> has quit  
04:14 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki

07:04 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
07:34 <MasterPiece> has joined #xwiki  
07:44 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki

08:16 <cjd> has quit  
08:20 <ramona\_> has joined #xwiki  
08:22 <ramona\_> has quit  
08:23 <ramona\_> has joined #xwiki  
08:56 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
09:00 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:04 <ramona\_> has quit  
09:05 <ramona\_> has joined #xwiki  
09:22 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:24 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:53 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
09:56 <mflorea> has quit  
09:57 <mflorea2> has joined #xwiki  
10:05 <tmortagne> has quit  
10:07 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
10:16 <vmassol> good morning  
10:16 <vmassol> FYI just finishing setting up the new githubstats macro on the hall of fame on xwiki.org and I'll then focus on checking our CI  
10:46 <\_cjd> has joined #xwiki  
10:47 <vmassol> sorry for the spam...  
10:47 <\_cjd>  /mode +q xwikibot!\*@\*  
10:48 <\_cjd>  /mode -q xwikibot!\*@\*    to let it talk again  
10:48 <vmassol> actually I'll stop the bot a bit to import the authors  
10:48 <\_cjd> as you like  
10:48 <vmassol> ok will try your way  
10:48 <\_cjd> it's quick and easy  
10:48 <vmassol> !news  
10:48 <cjd> has quit  
10:48 <vmassol> seems to work  
10:49 <\_cjd> yeah, it's enforced at the ircd level  
10:49 <\_cjd> is now known as <cjd>  
10:59 <vmassol> I hope I won't make xwiki.org too slow… I'm importing the users from git now  
11:09 <cjd> organize dat information :)  
11:43 <vmassol>  /mode -q xwikibot!\*@\*  
11:43 <vmassol> oops  
11:43 <vmassol> still working  
11:44 <vmassol> possibly finished importing data from github… :)  
11:44 <vmassol> ah no  
11:44 <vmassol> :)  
11:48 <vmassol> grrr  
11:49 <vmassol> xwiki.org is restarting I think  
11:49 <vmassol> just got a mail  
11:49 <vmassol> but xwikibot is still here, strange...  
12:31 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
12:34 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki  
12:34 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
12:34 <vmassol1> my mac crashed!  
12:34 <vmassol> has quit  
12:35 <vmassol1> is now known as <vmassol>  
12:50 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> has joined #xwiki  
13:15 <vmassol> wow it's still running….  
13:54 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> has quit  
14:23 <vmassol> hmm I wonder if there's an infinite loop… :)  
14:40 <\_cjd> has joined #xwiki  
14:43 <cjd> has quit  
15:04 <msmeria> has quit  
15:07 <gsmeria> has left #xwiki  
15:11 <vmassol> ClemensR: hi, do you mind if I move http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/FAQ/I+get+the+error+message+Method+org.postgresql.jdbc4.Jdbc4Connection.isValid%28int%29+is+not+yet+implemented to http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/InstallationPostgreSQL ?  
15:12 <ClemensR> no, of course not :)  
15:12 <vmassol> ok thanks, doing it  
15:39 <ramona\_> has quit  
16:33 <vmassol> ok I'm done for now on the hall of fame page  
16:33 <vmassol> you can check it out at http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/HallOfFame  
16:33 <vmassol> it's using version 2.0.1 of the githubstats app  
16:34 <vmassol> well done to Gaby for the first place on the last 365 days for contrib! :)  
16:34 <vmassol> too bad she's on holidays at this moment ;)  
16:35 <vmassol> ClemensR: you're 4th on contrib for the year, not bad!  
16:35 <vmassol> (in contrib)  
16:36 <ClemensR> should keep it up and push some work, Victor is breathing on my neck there :)  
16:36 <vmassol> yep but victor was an XWiki SAS employee and he's now left the company so you should be safe on that side ;)  
16:37 <ClemensR> ah, ok, but anyway :)  
16:37 <vmassol> what's cool is that I'm able to generate this automatically without having to reconcile identities, my code does it by itself :)  
16:38 <vmassol> (a lot of us have committed with several different ids in git)  
16:39 <vmassol> so we have 10 active committed in the xwiki org for the year  
16:39 <vmassol> btw all times is here: http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/HallOfFameFull  
16:40 <vmassol> Pbas: you're in the hall of fame! :)  
16:40 <ClemensR> yes, I see I had 4-5 different "identities" depending from where I commit, and if I have messed up my github config or not, but it does not show up on the page, nice :)  
16:41 <ClemensR> btw, who is 4F2E4A2E  ?  
16:41 <vmassol> he's O.J Sousa  
16:41 <vmassol> but he's not put his name on github so it cannot be guessed ;)  
16:42 <vmassol> indeed lots of identities for you Clemens: http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/GitHubStats/#|t=authors&p=1&l=15&id=clem  
16:42 <vmassol> grrr wrong encoding of |  
16:42 <ClemensR> ah, ok :)  
16:42 <vmassol> 5 identities  
16:47 <vmassol> ok our ci jobs are failing a lot… checking some  
16:55 <tmortagne> vmassol: now the last part if to match the github account with xwiki.org account to have link to xwiki.org profile ;)  
16:55 <vmassol> yeah…. :)  
16:56 <vmassol> before that I'd like to implement progress bars and change the update mechanism but not for now  
17:27 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
17:33 <vmassol> checking http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/org.xwiki.platform$xwiki-platform-faq-test-tests/1638/testReport/org.xwiki.faq.test.ui/FAQTest/testFAQ/  
17:33 <vmassol> could have been caused by my change of yesterday in the test fwk  
17:41 <vmassol> stupid me, fixing
